proper noun.description: A satellite of Uranus, the eleventh closest to the planet, with a diameter of 301 miles (485 km). Discovered in 1948, it is the innermost and smallest of the five major Uranian satellites and has a complex terrain of cratered areas and tracts of grooves and ridges.

adjective.description: Denoting or relating to the duty of the police to inform a person taken into custody of their right to legal counsel and the right to remain silent under questioning.
examples: the patrolman read Lee his Miranda rights

origin: 1960s: from Miranda versus Arizona, the case that led to this ruling by the Supreme Court.
